mapper.sql:
WITH RECURSIVE OC AS ( SELECT id AS "id" , name "text" , upper_id AS "parent" , 'dept' AS "type" , 1 AS depth , CAST('0' as varchar(100)) AS "sort" FROM department d WHERE upper_id IS NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT dept.id AS "id" , dept.name "text" , dept.upper_id "parent" , 'dept' AS "type" , 1 + depth AS depth , concat(OC.sort,'-' ,LPAD(LPAD(dept.sort,3,'0'), 4, '9')) AS sort FROM department dept INNER JOIN OC ON dept.upper_id = OC.id AND OC.type = 'dept' WHERE dept.is_deleted = 0 )
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT o.id , o.text , NVL(o.parent, '#') AS "parent" , o.type , o.depth , o.sort FROM OC o
UNION
SELECT e.id , concat(code.name ,' ', e.name) "text" , e.department_id "parent" , 'person' AS "type" , OC.depth + 1 AS depth , concat(OC.sort,'-', LPAD(100 - CAST(code.id AS INTEGER), 4 , '0')) AS "sort" FROM employee e INNER JOIN OC ON e.department_id = OC.id INNER JOIN code ON e.pos_id = code.id AND code.type_id = '300' ) uoc ORDER BY sort

SELECT e.id , concat(d.name,' ',c.name,' ',e.name) AS "text" , d.id AS "parent" , c.id AS "sort" FROM employee e INNER JOIN code c ON c.id = e.pos_id AND c.type_id = '300' INNER JOIN department d ON d.id = e.department_id WHERE d.id = #{deptId} ORDER BY sort desc

SELECT e.id , concat(d.name,' ',c.name,' ',e.name) AS "text" , d.id AS "parent" , c.id AS "sort" FROM employee e INNER JOIN code c ON c.id = e.pos_id AND c.type_id = '300' INNER JOIN department d ON d.id = e.department_id WHERE e.id = #{empId} ORDER BY sort desc

SELECT o.id , o.text AS "name" , e.id AS "employee_id" , concat(c.name, ' ' , e.name) AS "employee_name" , e.phone_number , a.url AS "profile_img" FROM OC o LEFT JOIN employee e ON o.id = e.department_id AND e.id != #{id} LEFT JOIN code c ON c.id = e.pos_id AND c.type_id = '300' LEFT JOIN attach a ON a.tbl_id = 1077 AND a.parent_id = e.id ORDER BY o.sort
